channel.title: Client Error Please Help
channel.description:
java.lang.NullPointerException at Stream.readUnsignedWord(Stream.java:148) at Background.<init>(Background.java:11) at client.loadTitleScreen(client.java:3344) at client.startUp(client.java:8163) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:5583) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Error: loaderror Starting up
anyone know how to fix?

item.title: Client Error Please Help
item.dc:creator: @mangalover51 mangalover51
item.description:
@mangalover51 wrote:

well, it can’t identify your source it doesn’t know what type it is or something =P sorry i can’t help much when i had that error before i just got a new client and it worked.

item.title: Client Error Please Help
item.dc:creator: @mangalover51 mangalover51
item.description:
@mangalover51 wrote:

you cannot use that client with the source your using choose a differn’t one to use.

ex. bluurs, etc some client’s won’t work with some sources it will load then exit right away just download another client.

Read full topic
